taskDefinition.name: BMC ITSM7 Change Work CE
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Creates a BMC ITSM7 Infrastructure Change Work Info record based upon the parameters provided.

parameter.label: Change Number:
parameter.tooltip: The change number of the Change to associate the Change Work Info entry with.

parameter.label: Include Review Request:
parameter.tooltip: Option to prepend the review request URL to the Notes of the Change Work Info entry.

parameter.label: Include Question Answers:
parameter.tooltip: Option to append the question answer pairs to the Notes of the Change Work Info entry.

parameter.label: Work Info Summary:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Summary of the Change Work Info entry.

parameter.label: Work Info Notes:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Notes of the Change Work Info entry.

parameter.label: Work Info Submit Date:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Date of the Change Work Info entry.

parameter.label: Attachment Input Type
parameter.tooltip: Choose Field if the input for the attachment info as a Field Name or choose JSON if the input is an attachment's JSON from the Get Attachment Info handler. Note that if Field is specified, the fields entered should only allow one attachment.

parameter.label: Attachment Field 1:
parameter.tooltip: The Field Name of an attachment question to retrieve an attachment from.

parameter.label: Attachment Field 2:
parameter.tooltip: The Field Name of an attachment question to retrieve an attachment from.

parameter.label: Attachment Field 3:
parameter.tooltip: The Field Name of an attachment question to retrieve an attachment from.

parameter.label: Attachment JSON 1:
parameter.tooltip: The Field Name of an attachment question to retrieve an attachment from.

parameter.label: Attachment JSON 2:
parameter.tooltip: The Field Name of an attachment question to retrieve an attachment from.

parameter.label: Attachment JSON 3:
parameter.tooltip: The Field Name of an attachment question to retrieve an attachment from.

parameter.label: Submitter:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Submitter of the Change Work Info entry.

parameter.label: Locked:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Incident Work Info entry Locked status.

parameter.label: View Access:
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Incident Work Info entry to Public or Internal.

parameter.label: Submission ID:
parameter.tooltip: The id of the CE submission to retrieve answers for.

parameter.label: Space Slug:
parameter.tooltip: Can be used to override the info parameter provided.
